biography: Hossein Zandbaf is an editor who was born in 1946 in Sari, Iran. He started his career in cinema and starred in “The Assignment” as a director. His most notable activities are “Heartbroken” by Ali Rooyintan, “The Lizard” by Kamal Tabrizi, and “Khabgah-e Dokhtaran” directed by Mohammadhossein Latifi.
name: Hossein Zandbaf
